name: vault.rpg
description:
A treasure with the power to turn the tide of any war lies hidden within a vault. Two treasure hunters have set their eyes on it, but what will it take from them to get it?

Features:

- Collect treasures, and then use them to boost your party's power! Be it stat increases or new skills to use, be judicious when using them, for you can't  undo your decisions!

- Do things in whatever order you choose! There's three locks on the vault, but what order you undo them is up to you! Do you risk falling to more powerful enemies for the chance of getting better treasure early?

- A ranking system! How much treasure you have by the final boss affects your final judgement. Of course, you can always walk out with your ultimate goal unmet...

- A hidden boss!

- Music blatantly stolen from various games over two decades old [save one, which is only a decade and a half old]

Originally made for Slime Salad's 2019 one-map contest.
